lex.text: Adams County, Pennsylvania has Carrol County, Maryland to its southeast and Pennsylvania's Cumberland County is to the north of the Adams County. The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is in Adams County of the municipality of Gettysburg Pennsylvania. .
